law.text:
Each hotel, motel, and lodging house shall post in a prominent place in each guest room a notice that states:
the location of the nearest exits and fire pull stations;
the procedures to be followed if the fire or smoke detector gives warning signals; and
the procedures to be followed if fire or smoke develops.
